deleteBallot(bytes32).details: msg.sender is expected to be the Core Operatorowner has ability to pause this operation indirectly

params._method: Name of the smart contract method

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

paused().return: true if the contract is paused, false otherwise.

pruneBallots().details: msg.sender is expected to be the Core Operator or Owner, and can be called at the discretion of any authorized partyowner has ability to pause this operation indirectly

registerBallot(bytes32,string,uint256,ui.details: msg.sender is expected to be the Core Operatorowner has ability to pause this operation indirectly

params._method: Name of the smart contract method
params._threshold: Min. number of votes required for consesnsus
params._votingWindow: Duration of voting windows expressed in number of blocks

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

updateBallot(bytes32,uint256,uint256).details: msg.sender is expected to be the Core Operatorowner has ability to pause this operation indirectly

params._method: Name of the smart contract method
params._threshold: Min. number of votes required for consesnsus
params._votingWindow: Duration of voting windows expressed in number of blocks

vote(bytes32,bytes32).details: msg.sender is expected to be the Core Operatorowner has ability to pause this operation indirectly

params._hash: Hash of the arguments the Core operator voting wants to invoke the specified method with
params._method: Name of the smart contract method

deleteBallot(bytes32).notice: Delete Ballot for specified method Deletes a Ballot for a smart contract method

pruneBallots().notice: Prune Ballots This method must be explicitly invoked to prune Voting Rounds that have expired (aka timeout) and no longer to be persisted within the contract

registerBallot(bytes32,string,uint256,ui.notice: Register Ballot for method Creates a Ballot for a smart contract method

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

updateBallot(bytes32,uint256,uint256).notice: Update Ballot for specified method Updates a Ballot for a smart contract method

vote(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Register a Vote Submits a vote to be included in a voting round for the smart contract method specified
